title: Protecting health-care workers: Use of a Body Covering Transparent Sheet during and after Intubation of Patients with Covid-19.

similar.title: Use of transparent curtains on bedside of COVID-19 patients.
text: Use of transparent curtains on bedside of COVID-19 patients.

The pandemic of COVID-19 has brought day to day life at a standstill. During such difficult times, safety of medical staff becomes more important as they are on the frontlines in tackling the disease. Despite aggressive safety measures and use of personal protective equipment (PPE), infections and deaths have been reported among HCP's.(1) This has led to a panic and stigma in the medical community.
abstract: The pandemic of COVID-19 has brought day to day life at a standstill. During such difficult times, safety of medical staff becomes more important as they are on the frontlines in tackling the disease. Despite aggressive safety measures and use of personal protective equipment (PPE), infections and deaths have been reported among HCP's.(1) This has led to a panic and stigma in the medical community.
